TextView.android:text: Creator: Abe Gustafson \nDate: 5/2/2016\nIntention: To have a decent Demonstration

My goal was to create a user friendly and visually appealing scheduling app. I originally wanted to implement more features, however, I ran out time.


To use this app:
 You begin by picking a number of tasks through the 'Add Task' button. You then can display your schedule with the 'Create Schedule' button, as well as remove tasks using the 'Remove Task' button.
 Tasks that are added can either have set times or unbounded times (which will result in the program trying to fit them in between or after set time tasks)

 **Currently there is a bug related with a memory leak that does not let you use more than a handfull of tasks in your schedule. This began when I started trying to implement the scheduling algorithm that is used to place unbound tasks.
To Go back, press the built in back button
